ClusterSecretReference.description: Secret reference and corresponding properties of a key vault secret.

referenceName.description: Reference name of the secret to be used in service configs.

type.description: Type of key vault object: secret, key or certificate.

version.description: Version of the secret in key vault.

keyVaultObjectName.description: Object identifier name of the secret in key vault.

keyVaultResourceId.description: Name of the user Key Vault where all the cluster specific user secrets are stored.

content.description: Free form content of the entire configuration file.

path.description: Path of the config file if content is specified.

values.description:
List of key value pairs
where key represents a valid service configuration name and value represents the value of the config.

component.description: Name of the component the config files should apply to.

serviceName.description: Name of the service the configurations should apply to.

fqdn.description: FQDN for connecting to the endpoint.
